flume > Flume Regex Filtering Interceptor

Testing flume regex filtering interceptor

author @regular.express

Image on regexpress/flume

properties

  • string regex
    Regular expression for matching excluded events. (default is ".*")
  • boolean excludeEvents
    If true, a regex match determines events to exclude, otherwise a regex determines events to include.
